des: "A very festive and tasty hot beverage, this was the hit of my Christmas cookie exchange. Serve with a cinnamon stick."
ins: Stir apple cider, spiced rum, and cinnamon schnapps together in a saucepan over medium heat until hot, about 10 minutes.
